OOC: I agree, Dcoburn. althoguh i must say that there is one 
difference between the Matrix and heaven. Bots not only go to the 
Matrix when they die, but their sparks also come from there.






--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "dcoburn" <dcoburn@n...> wrote:
> OOC: Alten Gould,
>         Yo dude, me and you may share the same dictionary, Hell is 
a place,
> but YOUR dictionary doesn't matter.  See, I'm against you saying 
Hell in
> this RPG too.  NOT because it's sometimes considered swearing, only 
because
> it is not proper transformer language.  Any Transformers/BW/BM fan 
knows
> that "Heaven" and "Hell" are not the proper terms for the 
transformers'
> heaven and hell
> 
> Our Version:  Heaven
> Transformer Version:  The Matrix
> 
> Our Version:  Hell
> Transformer Version:  The Pit
> 
>     So there ya go.  Sorry for any email boxes this clogs up and/or 
for
> anybody's time getting wasted.
